products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Oyster Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: If there's one addition to their trinity blackout range that we fell in love with the moment we set eyes on it then it's their oyster grey fabric. Stone greys are very much on-trend this season, and oyster allows you to gently work in one of the most popular shades whilst also breathing new life into your decor. We love the idea of combining oyster grey with simple natural tones and textures that allow the beauty of nature to come to the fore.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Dove - Roller Blind
products.description: When you think of a fabric that allows you to introduce some understated contemporary chic with a luxury vibe, it would be hard to think of anything other than trinity blackout dove. It's the beautiful finishing touch that no home should be without, so why hold back any longer?As you sit down and run your mind through the various different options, you need to think about how to match to your furniture.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity (blackout) black smoke is a colour that you perhaps don't expect to find all that often, but it's certainly a welcome surprise when you find it staring right back at you. The beauty of the washed blue is that it clearly sits atop a foundation of light grey that gives it a natural stone-like quality. This is a fabric that has 'versatility' as its middle name, so why not embrace the new creative avenues that it opens? It's all about allowing your individuality to run free so that you can really put your own stamp on things.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: The ajanta (blackout) in cream features an off-white abstract patterning on a barely-there, almost gold cream that shimmers gently as the light hits it. It will only be your indoors light that gets to it though, as this powerful blackout blind is every bit as effective as you'd hope at keeping outside light disturbances out. Team with rich creams and the subtlest of golds in a modern, luxurious kitchen, for which the wipe-clean fabric makes it perfect.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) in cream is a dark, dusky shade of cream, that isn't too far from magnolia. It's the perfect neutral, and what's more, it's hardy, wipe-clean, and simple to use. The high quality material and rolling mechanism of the palermo mean this blackout blind will last, year after year. Couple this rich hue with dark browns and paler creams in a warm, traditional kitchen, or use in the playroom amongst bolder, more playful colours.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout), Macaroon Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: Our anthology range is the perfect way to integrate the functionality of a blackout blind with the aesthetics of a contemporary style you'll never want to be without again. Macaroon cream has a slightly rich and dusky element to it which we know you're instantly going to fall in love with. Country chic is a great choice to explore further if you want to add this stunning fabric to a completely new style of decor.

products.title: Verdi (Blackout), Smoke Embers - Roller Blind
products.description: As you wonder what to do with your decor you notice something out of the corner of your eye; it's the fabric we call smoke embers from their new verdi (blackout) range. The way in which the light blue shimmers is all down to the intricacy of the stitching, and it's a visual you'll remember for many years to come. If you want to be able to elevate the dining room to the space you love to host your friends and family in it's all about adding refined luxurious touches.

products.title: Verdi (Blackout), Pearl River - Roller Blind
products.description: Verdi (blackout) pearl river is a fabric that seems to flow out of the page and meet you head on. The beauty of it is that it combines a subtle blue background that sits gently where you place it, with an eye-catching pattern that demands to be seen. This is luxury on a whole other level. Taking the dining room and turning it into your own function room that is filled with friends and family night after night is something we all dream of doing.
